name: Copenhagen Marriott Hotel
description: Experience a luxury getaway at Copenhagen Marriott Hotel, one of the finest modern hotels in Denmark. Discover spacious, beautifully appointed hotel rooms that rank among some of the largest in Copenhagen, Denmark. Each is a downtown oasis with complimentary Wi-Fi access, a sleek marble bathroom, flat-screen TV and floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase mesmerizing views of the Copenhagen city center. Indulge in international cuisine and captivating harbor views from our restaurants and bars, including a beautiful outdoor terrace. Host impressive business meetings and conferences in our modern, canal-view venues. With a picturesque waterfront location in Copenhagen city center, we're near Tivoli Gardens, Harbor Beach, and famed Stroget Street. The Copenhagen Marriott Hotel provides an ideal backdrop for business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Griffen Spa Hotel
description: Featuring rooms with views of the Baltic Sea or the old town, this central Rønne hotel also offers free WiFi and free private parking. Free spa access is offered to guests over 16 years of age. Each guest room at Griffen Spa Hotel includes a seating area and a work desk. Some rooms have balconies with sea views. Free entry into the hotel's 1,000 m² spa and wellness centre is available to all guests. Spa facilities include a hot tub, sauna and a heated indoor pool. Treatments are bookable for an additional fee. Other facilities include a bar and restaurant with a summertime terrace. Spa Hotel Griffen is within 1 km of Rønne Bus Terminal. The ferry terminal is 15 minutes’ walk away. Bornholm Airport is the closest airport, located 6.9 km away.

name: Benniksgaard Hotel
description: Situated at the highest point in Rinkenæs by Flensburg Firth – with Benniksgaard Golf Course as its closest neighbour – the four star Benniksgaard Hotel, BW Signature Collection boasts views of unparalleled beauty. Benniksgaard takes its name from a family farm dating all the way back to 1393. Today, Benniksgaard is privately owned and run as a hotel. All the buildings have undergone a comprehensive and painstaking renovation. The rustic style, exposed beams and bright colours create an airy, inviting atmosphere. The old chicken house has been transformed into Restaurant Pejsestuen, the longest wing into a hotel wing with 31 rooms – and the old farmhouse from 1782 into fourteen stunning spacious rooms and suites. With its squinting walls, sash windows and creaking floors, the listed farmhouse is a constant reminder of bygone times. The first floor staircase is a particularly interesting relic, and indeed, its narrow steps have been a constant feature of the farmhouse. The old grain stores and a recently added wing are home to several function and conference rooms, while the wing formerly occupied by agricultural machinery now houses BenniksgaardButik shop, offering a wide range of items to suit all tastes.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Kirstine
description: This hotel is 500 metres from Næstved Train Station. Free wired internet, tea/coffee facilities and cable TV are standard room features. Facilities include a sun terrace and a restaurant. Hotel Kirstine’s à la carte restaurant focuses on traditional Danish cuisine. Vegetarian dishes and children's meals are also available. It has a cosy, open fireplace during winter. Staff can help arrange canoeing trips on the Suså River. Free parking is offered at the hotel as well as two charging stations for electric cars (plug 16A CEE). BonBon Land Amusement Park is a 15-minute drive from Kirstine Hotel. Other area activities include golfing, as well as swimming at Karrebæksminde Beach, 10 km away.

name: Munkebjerg Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is surrounded by forest, 300 metres from the Vejle Fjord. It features a casino, spa and pool area, and terrace and restaurant with views of the water. Munkebjerg Hotel’s modern rooms have a flat-screen TV, designer furniture and a free Wi-Fi access. All overlook either the forest or fjord. Spa facilities include an indoor pool, saunas, hot tubs and massage chairs. More active guests can use the gym or tennis courts. Hotel Munkebjerg also has 3 restaurants and a lobby bar. Dining options range from traditional Danish dishes to gourmet cuisine. The cellar has 600 wines to choose from. Free parking is available on site. Vejle Golf Club is 2 km away, and packages can be arranged at Munkebjerg's reception.

name: Hjerting Badehotel
description: Situated directly on the beach, this hotel is 9 km away from Esbjerg’s town centre. It offers free Wi-Fi, impressive North Sea views, along with a small sauna and fitness room. The light and airy guest rooms at Hjerting Badehotel all include a flat-screen TV and minibar. Several have scenic views over Skallingen and the islands of Fanø and Langli. Guests can enjoy gourmet cuisine and panoramic views of Ho Bay at the on-site Restaurant Strandpavillonen. Ship-Inn, the hotel’s English pub and café, serves light dishes and drinks in a relaxed setting. Bicycles can be rented at Badehotel Hjerting to explore the surroundings. Hotel staff can recommend several golf courses located nearby. Free parking is available on site.

name: Enjoy Resorts Marina Fiskenæs
description: This South Jutland property is on the Fiskenæs peninsula, 1 km from central Gråsten. It offers accommodation with a fully-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Leisure options include a water park and a free gym and spa. All apartments and holiday homes at Enjoy Resort Marina Fiskenæs feature a living room with digital TV and a DVD player. Guests can also enjoy a dishwasher and washing machine. Communal facilities include a restaurant, a private beach area and a climbing wall. A sauna, steam room and cold bath are among the spa facilities offered, and guests can book beauty treatments on site. A playground and playroom are available for younger guests. Enjoy Resort Marina is within 20 minutes’ drive of Dybbøl Banke Museum, while Gråsten Castle, royal summer residence, is just a 5-minute drive away. On-site parking is free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Faroe Islands
description: Rest well at our new hotel in Torshavn, just five minutes from the beautiful Svartafoss Waterfall, Nordic House, and the National Museum of the Faroe Islands. There’s plenty of shopping, natural areas, and restaurants within a few minutes, and you can get around easily with a bus stop outside our doors. Our on-site restaurant features local produce and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.Hilton

name: Visithomes Faroe Islands
description: No description found

name: Hôtel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt provides luxury 5-star accommodation in Stockholm. A short walk from Stockholm Palace, it offers modern rooms equipped with free wireless internet access, a mini bar and a private bathroom. This historic hotel provides a number of facilities, including a plunge pool, a sauna and free Wi-Fi. Romance seekers will enjoy the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt's 144 elegant rooms offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV, plus all the essentials required for a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Stockholm, with Stortorget Stockholm just a short stroll away. The Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden are a 10-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Diplomat
description: Set in an impressive 1911-era Art Nouveau building on upscale Strandvägen boulevard, Hotel Diplomat offers great views over Nybroviken Bay, spa and fitness room access and a restaurant with summer terrace. WiFi is free. Diplomat’s modern interior was designed by renowned architect Per Öberg and combines classic elegance with contemporary design. Each room features blackout curtains, a generous workspace and quality Dux beds with premium linen. All include luxury toiletries and a smart TV with Chromecast. The in-house restaurant uses fresh, local produce to create classic Swedish dishes with a Mediterranean twist. The waterfront terrace is an ideal spot to take in the waterfront views during summer. Guests can enjoy a glass of champagne or cocktail in the bar after a day exploring Stockholm. For relaxation or fitness needs, the hotel has a spacious, well-equipped gym and a sauna. The Diplomat is just 300 metres from Stockholm’s Royal Theatre. Local buses stops directly outside the hotel. Archipelago-bound boats depart regularly from across the street.

name: Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection, located on the fashionable Standvagen, an extraordinary 4 Star hotel that many call their second home. Within a comfortable walking distance from cultural attractions, shopping, first-class restaurants, the archipelago and round-trip boats, this beautiful boutique hotel stand with pride.bestwestern.com

name: Hilton Stockholm Slussen
description: Welcome to the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel, enjoying wonderful views over the water and the Old Town. The hotel is located in the hip Södermalm area and conveniently located within walking distance to many of Stockholm's main tourist attractions and the city center. All 289 guest and 16 meeting rooms are filled with natural daylight and featuring stylish Swedish décor. Choose from a range of spacious Hilton Guest, Deluxe, Executive rooms and Suites at the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel. When upgrading to an Executive room or Suite you will enjoy the breath-taking city and sea views and exclusive access to the hotel’s contemporary Executive lounge. When you want to keep up your fitness regime we offer a selection of cardiovascular equipment and free weights, or you can take part in an energetic exercise class. You can also make an appointment with a personal trainer. In Panorama Restaurant you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast to get the day off to a great start. Eken Bar offers Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist, serving both lunch and dinner. We use seasonal ingredients, which are locally produced, wherever we can. In Eken Bar, you can sip on a well-made cocktail, while enjoying the lounge music and panoramic views over the city.Hilton

name: Lydmar Hotel
description: Situated by the National Museum, this chic waterfront hotel offers views of the Old Town and Royal Palace. It offers a popular bistro-style restaurant and art exhibitions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Lydmar Hotel’s spacious rooms are individually decorated and have wooden floors. Many feature original stucco work, wood beams and high windows. All have a TV, minibar. The hotel restaurant serves European cuisine; everything from escargots to steak tartare to Sicilian fish. In the summer, the outdoor terrace offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy fresh cocktails. Archipelago boat tours regularly depart from Strömkajen Harbour, which is 100 metres from Lydmar Hotel. Stureplan Square, with its shops and nightlife, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will happily recommend other local sights and attractions.

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: The Red Boat
description: Set over 2 boats, this hostel is anchored at Riddarfjärden Bay of Lake Mälaren in central Stockholm. It provides a restaurant with lunch and dinner options, a bar and two sun terraces with outdoor furniture. Each simply decorated room at Den Röda Båten includes wooden furnishings, bed linen and a wardrobe. Most cabins have shared bathroom facilities, which are located in the hallway. Superior cabins include a private bathroom. Some cabins feature views of the lake. Free WiFi is available on both boats. A daily breakfast buffet is available at Röda Båten. Slussen Metro Station and the city’s historic Old Town are both within 650 metres of the hostel. The trendy Södermalm district, 10 minutes’ walk away, offers a wide selection of shopping, dining and nightlife choices. Stockholm Central Station is a 3-minute Metro ride away.

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Hotel Riverton
description: Hotel Riverton is a contemporary independent design hotel located centrally in Gothenburg by the waterfront which is fully family-owned and operated since 1991. With personal care and attention to detail in every aspect of our guests experience, we've integrated the feeling of comfort, charm, and style combined with excellent food and drink experiences.Explore our story from our rooftop bar and restaurant to our rejuvenating spa and the comforts of our bedrooms making us the perfect destination for those who love unfussy luxury. Beautifully situated by the harbour entrance in Gothenburg, Hotel Riverton is located in the city centre and within walking distance to the Opera, the Casino and the chic shopping scene of Kungsgatan, Avenyn, NK and Nordstan. The charming old town and the picturesque Haga district is within a short stroll.Lindholmen Science Centre is just a ferry ride over, from Stenpiren which is a hub for trams, ferries and bus services, located 250 m from the Hotel. In summer time we highly reccomend to take one of the summer boats departing from Stenprien which takes you out to the gorgeous archipelago of Gothenburg. Within the hotel, there are two restaurants and one lobby bar, including View Skybar & Restaurant which is home to spectacular panoramic views across the Gothenburg harbour. Enjoy one of our award-winning cocktails in the bar or experience our a la carte menu from the 12th floor. Give yourself a break and unwind in our new Serenity Spa when staying with us in Gothenburg. Enjoy the inviting atmosphere and recover in our indoor pool, aromatherapy, steam or dry sauna or relax at your own pace in our Spa Lounge. We also offer a brand-new gym with the latest cardio machines from Precor, free weights and cardio technology from Preva. Please note, the minimum age requirement to enter the Spa facilities is 18 years old, from 16 years old if accompanied an adult. *CASH FREE from 1st Januari 2017*iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Malmo Arena Hotel
description: Best Western Malmo Arena Hotel is located in the southwestern part of Malmo. Besides 395 guest rooms, we offer six rooms for meetings and events, a restaurant, a sports bar and a sky bar on the 15th floor. Free gym, sauna and Wi-Fi are included for all staying guests. The hotel is located 150 meters from the train station Malmo Hyllie where you can reach Malmo Center in three minutes, Kastrup in 12 minutes and Copenhagen Center in 25 minutes. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Wisby
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Wisby in Visby, SE near the Visby City Center, Botanical Garden, Gotlands Fornsal museum and the Visby Airport. Amenities at our hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Visby hotels like our Clarion Hotel Wisby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Strandporten
description: Kalk Hotel is boutique hotel located on Strandgatan, in a beautiful building from the 17th century, carefully renovated with a stylish interior and Gotland details. There are 21 rooms, all of which offer lovely light, comfortable beds from Jensen and luxurious bathrooms with limestone details from Gotland. Some rooms have a balcony with a view of the city, the sea and the beautiful park Almedalen -Perfect for enjoying the first cup of coffee in the morning, a siesta after a lovely day in Visby or why not a glass of sparkling wine before dinner at one of the town's fantastic restaurants. Breakfast buffet: We want to give you the best possible start to the day which is why we spend some special love on our breakfast buffet. For us, sustainability is important and that there is something for everyone, even if you have an allergy or have a special diet. It does not prevent us from serving you a delicious breakfast with a healthy twist. Among the freshly baked breads you will find our homemade müsli and granola, energy shots and much more. The breakfast buffet is served weekdays 07:00 - 10:00 and holidays 08:00 - 11:00. During the summer always till 11:00. The entire hotel is non-smoking. The hotel does not accept cash payment. We are looking forward at having you as our guest. Warm welcome!

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Bolinder Munktell
description: The Clarion Collection Htl Bolinder Munktell is ideally located on Lake Malaren, within walking distance of the Munktells Museum. We are also minutes from Malardalen University, Tingsgarden Glasbruk garden, Eskilstuna Art Museum and the Parken Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free wireless Internet, a sauna, afternoon tea, meeting space, guest laundry facilities and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. Irons and ironing boards are available upon request. Book a room with us today.Choice Hotels

name: Strand City Hotell
description: This family-owned hotel in Örnsköldsvik is only 200 meters from the town's main square. We offer our guests free coffee around the clock. The hotel has a sauna, WiFi and a number of parking lots. These cannot be pre-booked. The individually decorated rooms at Strand City Hotel all have a seating area and some rooms have a work desk. We serve breakfast buffet served daily. A Thai restaurant and the Pinchos restaurant are located in the same building as the Strand Hotel, while a variety of other restaurants and cafes can be found in the surrounding area. Örnsköldsvik's central station is approximately 800 m away. Örnsköldsvik's marina and the arena Fjällräven Center are both 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. We work a lot with sustainability. We think a lot about seeing a cycle in food. We take care of the food and try to think about not throwing it away. We try to reduce the chain between the producer and your guests. We also work with products that are environmentally classed. We are constantly inventing new solutions to be better.

name: Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar
description: Dramatically set where the Hallandsåsen Ridge meets the Kattegatt Sea, Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar Hotell offers a spa, rooms with private balconies and free WiFi access. Båstad is just 15 minutes’ drive away. Each of Hotel Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar’s rooms has a private bathroom with shower. All include a refrigerator, a tea/coffee maker and an LCD TV with cable channels. The in-house restaurant offers local specialities and panoramic sea views. Guests can explore the cliffs, beaches and caves of the surrounding Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar Nature Reserve. Treatments can be reserved at the on-site wellness centre.

name: Nynäs Havsbad
description: This early 1900s property is in Nynäshamn, on Trehörningen Island. It offers spa treatments, panoramic sea views and fine dining. Stockholm city centre is just 45 minutes’ drive away. Nynäs Havsbad’s modern rooms have a TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Modern European cuisine made from seasonal, local produce is served in the restaurant. A set 3-course menu is offered Monday-Thursday, with à la carte options at weekends. The hotel offers pool and sauna facilities for an extra fee. Various treatments are offered at the on-site spa. In the wintertime, it is possible to take a dip in a hole in the ice. Free public parking spaces are found nearby. Nynäs Havsbad Hotel is 1.5 km from Nynäshamn Station, and Nynäshamn Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes’ drive.

name: Strandpiren Hotell
description: Situated 1 km from the centre of Hudiksvall, Strandpiren Hotell features free WiFi access and free private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area for your convenience. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. You will find luggage storage space at the property. Bicycles can be rented at the hotel, and the area is also popular for golfing.

name: Elite Plaza Hotel, Örnsköldsvik
description: This central Örnsköldsvik hotel is situated at the Inner Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, an on-site British pub and a top-floor relaxation area with a gym and impressive views. Modern furnishings, wooden floors and a flat-screen TV with cable channels are provided in all Elite Plaza Örnsköldsvik rooms. Some feature a minibar and views over the harbour. On-site dining can be enjoyed at the Bishop's Arms pub and restaurant which also has a waterfront, outdoor terrace open during the summer. On Sundays, guests can enjoy Elite Örnsköldsvik's breakfast until 12:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during high season. Örnsköldsvik Central Station is about 5 minutes' walk away, while the E4 Motorway is just 400 metres away from the hotel.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel With
description: Get together at the pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel With in Tromso, Norway. Nearby attractions include the Polar Museum, University of Tromso, Tromso Botanic Garden, Arctic Cathedral and the Tromso Airport. Take a day trip to the nearby town of Finnkroken for fishing, bird watching and enjoying the beautiful scenery. Enjoy a meal or drink in our restaurant and bar. Amenities include free organic breakfast, free light evening buffet, free weekday newspaper, 24-hour coffee, tea and fruit, a sauna, guest laundry facilities and meeting rooms. All guest rooms have cable television and trouser presses. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay. Complimentary evening buffet: 7 days/week 6pm-10pm. Please note that all Choice hotels in Scandinavia are 100% non-smoking properties.Choice Hotels

name: Yggdrasil farmhotel retreat & spa
description: Yggdrasil farmhotel retreat & spa is located on Kvaløya island, 50-minutes drive from central Tromsø. Free WiFi access is available at the farm. Guests can enjoy Norwegian dishes at the on-site restaurant, based on local and organic ingredients. The accommodation options will provide you with a patio and either private or shared bathroom facilities. Some accommodation options have private kitchen facilities. All rooms offer a view. A buffet breakfast with homemade bread is available, as well as a cafe and bar. At Yggdrasiltunet, guests will find a hot tub, sauna, garden and terrace with panoramic views. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. Horses, sheep, chickens and rabbits live on the farm. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Yggdrasiltunet is 30 km from Langnes Airport. The summer ferry from Brensholmen to Botnhamn on Senja island is a 17-minute drive away.

name: Arctic Glamping Tromsø
description: No description found

name: Scandic Park Sandefjord
description: Scandic Park Sandefjord is situated in Sandefjord and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Rooms at Scandic Park Sandefjord are well-appointed and offer a private bathroom, a telephone and a refrigerator. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Guests staying at Scandic Park Sandefjord can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Scandic Park Sandefjord is within a short walk of the Sandefjord Museum. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Sandefjord Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Sandefjord.Revato

name: Sola Strand Hotel
description: Located a 15-minute drive from Stavanger, this hotel offers direct access to the 2.5 km long Solastranden Beach. It features a popular beach bar, large sun terraces and a modern spa. The bright and airy rooms of Sola Strand Hotel feature modern décor, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Free tea and coffee-making facilities are provided in each room. Large lunch buffets are served at the Montroyal Restaurant, which is set in a refurbished cigar room from an early 1900s cruise ship. Sola Strand’s à la carte restaurant offers seasonal specialities. For relaxation, the Nordsjøbadet Spa offers saunas, a cold water plunge pool and an indoor swimming pool. Treatments include soothing facials and algae body wraps. Guests can try windsurfing or borrow a bicycle on site during summer.

name: Stryn House - Hotel & Apartments
description: Stryn House - Hotel & Apartments offers a restaurant, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. A children's playground is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the aparthotel. The nearest airport is Sandane, Anda Airport, 49 km from Stryn House - Hotel & Apartments.
